This entry has yet to be written...
Enter dungeon as a solo player?
Variant actions cannot be changed during battle or while the recast timer is on cooldown.
To read this entry, you must first complete the quest “<sheet(Quest,IntegerParameter(1),0)>.”

A new season has begun, and you have unclaimed rewards! Speak with the seasonal quartermaster at the Wolves' Den Pier to claim last season's tier rewards. Last season's rewards will only be available until the close of the current season.
Show party member portraits at the start of duty.
Align portraits to bottom of window.
By changing your job to <sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)>, you may carry over the hotbar and cross hotbar settings from <sheet(ClassJob,<sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),28)>,0)>.

As the actions from <sheet(ClassJob,<sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),28)>,0)> may also be used when playing <sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)>, transferring these settings will allow you to readily play in a similar fashion.

This option is recommended for those who have little or no experience with <sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)>.

Should you require time to consider, this window will open again the next time you change your job to <sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)>.
※This window will no longer display after progressing through job quests.
Are you sure you wish to collect all of the leavings gathered by the creature comforter? ※Caretaking services will continue after collection.

Warning: You will not be able to receive all of the items. Those that cannot fit in your isleventory will be discarded.

Do you still wish to proceed?
Dismiss the caretaker and release StringParameter(1) from the pasture? ※Available leavings not exceeding isleventory capacity will be collected. ※Released creatures cannot be retrieved.
Are you sure you wish to collect all of the yields harvested by the produce producer? ※Gardening services will continue after collection.

Warning: You will not be able to receive all of the items. Those that cannot fit in your isleventory will be discarded.

Do you still wish to proceed?
Dismiss the caretaker and release from the pasture? ※Available leavings not exceeding isleventory capacity will be collected. ※Released creatures cannot be retrieved.
Place the selected item as a glamour? ※The selected furnishing item will be bound to you and remain in your inventory.

The item you are attempting to place is already registered as a glamour. By continuing to place this glamour from your inventory, the selected furnishing item will become bound to you. Proceed? ※The selected furnishing item will remain in your inventory.

Use IntegerParameter(2) to register the selected item as a glamour? Registered glamours may be placed as many times as desired from the Registered Glamours list. ※Color settings will not be registered. ※The selected furnishing item will be bound to you and remain in your inventory.
This furnishing is not registered as a glamour. Proceed with removal? ※By using an island prism to register this item, you may place it as many times as desired via the Registered Glamours list.
You do not have this item.

This furnishing glamour is currently placed on your island. Remove glamour registration? ※While removing registration will not affect currently placed glamours, you will be unable to place this glamour again via the Registered Glamours list.

Enable this function to display a warning icon on your islekeep's index and workshop agenda when you have insufficient materials for any handicrafts under production for the selected period. Furthermore, a warning dialogue will display when building a structure, crafting an item, or shipping a handicraft will cause a material deficit in your inventory. ※Please note that the warning dialogue will not display if you already possess insufficient materials prior to performing any of the above actions.
Warning: One item or more is being used in the workshop. Do you still wish to proceed?
No furnishing glamours have been registered.
Remove the selected furnishing glamour? ※This glamour has been registered and may be placed again via the Registered Glamours list. ※Color settings will revert to default.
Remove glamour registration from the selected furnishing? ※You will need to use an island prism to register this item again.
Use IntegerParameter(2) to register this item as a glamour? Registered glamours may be placed as many times as desired from the Registered Glamours list. ※Color settings will not be registered.
This workshop's production schedule will be entirely erased. Proceed?
Filter displayed items by specified criteria.

<Num>IntegerParameter(1)</Num> outfit glamour-ready <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),1))>combination<Else/>combinations</If> found.
<If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(1),1))>Select the combination you wish to use.<Else/> </If>

Select the gear you wish to include in the outfit glamour. Only items of the same quality may be selected.
Glamour Prisms Required: <Num>IntegerParameter(1)</Num>
(Amount Held: <If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(2),999))>999+<Else/><Num>IntegerParameter(2)</Num></If>）
You lack the items required to complete the outfit.
Together, these items form an outfit glamour. Restoring them will return each item to its original form. Proceed?
Outfit is comprised of the following items:
The items below can be used to form an outfit glamour. Items used must be of the same quality.
The same outfit is already stored in your glamour dresser.
You do not have enough glamour prisms.
Used as part of an outfit glamour.

Adjust settings for the actions below when requirements for execution are met.
Enable recast timer to prevent erroneous input.
You will lose all unsaved changes. Proceed?
List of actions that can be assigned to the hotbar.
List of actions that can be assigned to the hotbar.
To prevent erroneous input from multiple button presses, a recast timer will be triggered when the action change occurs.
Display the World name of players from another World.
※When this option is unavailable, the <Icon>88</Icon> icon will be displayed.
Display icons for classes, jobs, and roles in the chat log.
Apply colors according to player roles.
Restore all name display settings to their default?
You will lose all unsaved changes. Proceed?

<Color>PlayerParameter(16)</Color>(<String>StringParameter(1)</String>) Prepare for battle!
(<String>StringParameter(2)</String>) Please come back safe, okay?
(<String>StringParameter(3)</String>) Come on! We have to go now!
(<String>StringParameter(4)</String>) Stop naggin' me! I know!<Color>stackcolor</Color>

Please select three attributes.
The third attribute will be set to a lower value.
These objectives can be completed repeatedly during the event period. Irregular tomestones will be claimed automatically upon completion.
These bonus objectives can be completed once per week, and each player will be assigned their own objective. Irregular tomestones can be claimed from the Mogpendium upon completion.
These challenges can be completed once per week by completing one of the two objectives. Irregular tomestones can be claimed from the Mogpendium upon completion.
This challenge can be completed once per event period. Irregular tomestones can be claimed from the Mogpendium upon completion.
The Moogle Treasure Trove is not currently underway.

Score at least <If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(7),0))><Num>IntegerParameter(7)</Num><Else/><Num>IntegerParameter(8)</Num></If> points during a single <sheet(ContentType,IntegerParameter(2),0)> voyage.
Complete the quest “<sheet(Quest,IntegerParameter(1),0)>,” “<sheet(Quest,IntegerParameter(2),0)>,” or “<sheet(Quest,IntegerParameter(3),0)>” to unlock.

Win a game of <sheet(ContentType,IntegerParameter(2),0)> against <ennoun(ENpcResident,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)> in <ennoun(PlaceName,2,<sheet(TerritoryType,<sheet(Level,IntegerParameter(10),9)>,5)>,2,1)>.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),2))>Arrive at <ennoun(PlaceName,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)> or <ennoun(PlaceName,2,IntegerParameter(6),2,1)> to unlock.<Else/> Arrive at <If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(3),0))><ennoun(PlaceName,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)><Else/>???</If> to unlock.</If>
Victory or defeat will determine the quantity of rewards.
Rewards differ depending on the GATE. Rewards can be viewed from “See Rewards.”
Obtained the Mogpendium. Would you like to view the tutorial? ※The tutorial can be accessed at any time via the button at the bottom-left of the window.

Enter a treasure dungeon via a teleportation portal <Num>IntegerParameter(8)</Num> times.
※Treasure hunts abandoned midway through will not count toward the total.
Decipher a timeworn map and collect the treasure.
Complete a stage of the Masked Carnivale.
Defeat <Num>IntegerParameter(8)</Num> notorious <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(8),1))>monster<Else/>monsters</If> in the Forbidden Land, Eureka.

Complete <Num>IntegerParameter(8)</Num> critical <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(8),1))>engagement<Else/>engagements</If> <If(Equal(IntegerParameter(5),735))>on the Bozjan southern front<Else/>in Zadnor</If>.
